narrativeData.story: In the land of Frosty Peaks, a great blizzard has descended upon the once peaceful region, causing chaos and destruction. The inhabitants look to you for guidance and strength to overcome the icy threats.
narrativeData.greetingGameMessage: Welcome to Frosty Peaks! Get ready to battle the chilling enemies lurking in the snow.
narrativeData.finalGameMessage: Congratulations on conquering the Frosty Peaks! You have brought peace back to the frozen land.

mainCharacter.name: Aria Iceheart
mainCharacter.backStory: Aria Iceheart, a skilled Ice Mage, was born in the heart of the Frosty Peaks. She has dedicated her life to mastering the icy elements to protect her homeland from any threats.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: You dare to challenge the might of the Frosty Peaks? Prepare to be frozen in your tracks by our icy power!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: Well fought, traveler. Perhaps you possess the strength to survive the frozen trials ahead.
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: Ha! The cold always claims the weak. Your fate is sealed in the icy embrace of the Frosty Peaks.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: Intruders in our frozen domain? The Glacial Goblins will make quick work of you!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: Impressive! You have bested the Glacial Goblins. But can you withstand the true chill of the Frosty Peaks?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: The Frosty Peaks claim another victim. Your bones will freeze in the depths of our icy caverns.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: The Avalanche Orcs will crush you like the falling snow! Prepare for a cold defeat!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: You have proven yourself against the Avalanche Orcs. But can you survive the true blizzard coming your way?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: The Frosty Peaks do not forgive trespassers. Your fate is sealed by the icy winds of our mountains.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: The Snowflake Spirits dance through the air, bringing a frosty demise to all who challenge them!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: You have melted the icy hearts of the Snowflake Spirits. But can you withstand the blizzard's true fury?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: The Snowflake Spirits leave no survivors. Your essence will become one with the eternal snow.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: The Icicle Imps will pierce your heart with icy shards! Tremble before our frosty power!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: You have shattered the Icicle Imps with your strength. But can you survive the cold embrace of the Frosty Peaks?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: Your warmth fades in the presence of the Icicle Imps. The Frosty Peaks claim another victim.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: Behold the might of the Blizzard Behemoths! Your end comes swiftly in the freezing winds of the Frosty Peaks.
enemyGroups.winMonologue: Impressive, traveler. You have bested the Blizzard Behemoths. Now face the true challenge that lies ahead.
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: The Blizzard Behemoths do not tolerate weakness. Your fate is frozen in the icy heart of the mountains.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: Prepare to be frozen solid by the Icebound Trolls! Your warmth will be a distant memory in our icy domain.
enemyGroups.winMonologue: You have thawed the Icebound Trolls. But can you withstand the true chill of the Frozen Citadel?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: The Frozen Citadel claims another victim. Your fate is sealed in the icy embrace of the Frosty Peaks.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: The Snowstorm Shamans call upon the blizzard to strike you down! Feel the chill of our icy magic!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: You have weathered the Snowstorm Shamans' wrath. But can you endure the true frost of the Frozen Citadel?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: Your warmth fades before the Snowstorm Shamans' power. The Frozen Citadel claims another victim.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: The Frozen Wyverns will swoop down from the icy skies to freeze you in your tracks! Prepare for a frosty demise!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: You have grounded the Frozen Wyverns. But can you endure the true cold of the Frozen Citadel?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: The Frozen Wyverns leave no survivors in their icy wake. Your fate is sealed by the frosty winds.

enemyGroups.battleStartMonologue: The chilling wails of the Blizzard Banshees will freeze your very soul! Tremble before our icy wrath!
enemyGroups.winMonologue: You have silenced the Blizzard Banshees' icy cries. But can you survive the true blizzard's fury?
enemyGroups.lostMonologue: Your warmth fades in the presence of the Blizzard Banshees. The Frozen Citadel claims another victim.
